function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Issues related to urban dynamics from the perspective of urban and human geography, urban design, and planning, and transportation engineering.","Impact":"Uncontrolled disease transmission due to lack of consideration for contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Incorporate public health principles and guidelines into urban planning and design, prioritize green spaces, and implement effective transportation management.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis for space planning, smart transportation systems, and urban green infrastructure.","People":"Urban residents, commuters, and city planners.","Owner":"City planners, public health officials, and urban designers."},{"Description":"Socio-spatial implications and urban space/ urban life dialectics from the field of environmental psychology.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in urban spaces due to lack of understanding of human behavior and interaction in relation to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Utilize behavioral science to inform urban design, integrate health-promoting structures and spaces, and enhance public awareness of disease transmission risks.","Technologies":"Social and behavioral modeling, virtual reality simulations for urban planning, and interactive public health education campaigns.","People":"Urban residents, visitors, and behavioral scientists.","Owner":"City planners, public health officials, and behavioral scientists."},{"Description":"New environments accommodating new living/working styles from ethnographical and anthropological perspectives.","Impact":"Potential for disease spread in new environments due to inadequate consideration of health and sanitation practices.","Mitigation":"Integrate cultural and anthropological insights into design, prioritize health infrastructure, and promote community engagement in health practices.","Technologies":"Cultural mapping tools, participatory design processes, and community health monitoring technology.","People":"Residents of new environments, community leaders, and cultural anthropologists.","Owner":"Urban developers, community organizations, and cultural anthropologists."}]}
